_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
dn14:1.4.1+dn14:1.12.24^who_else_mention: the Buddha Vipassī, the Buddha Sikhī, the Buddha Vessabhū, Koṇāgamana, Kassapa, The Buddhas Vipassī, Sikhī, Vessabhū, Koṇḍañña, Vipassī, Gotama, Khaṇḍa, Tissa, Abhibhū, Sambhava, Soṇa, Uttara, Vidhura, Sañjīva, Bhiyyosa, Bhāradvāja, Sāriputta, Moggallāna, Asoka, Khemaṅkara, Upasanta, Buddhija, Sotthija, Sabbamitta, King Bandhuma, Queen Bandhumatī, Bandhumatī, King Aruṇa, Queen Pabhāvatī, Aruṇavatī, King Suppatīta, Queen Vassavatī, Anoma, Aggidatta, Visākhā, Khema, Khemavatī, Yaññadatta, Uttarā, Sobha, Sobhavatī, Brahmadatta, Dhanavatī, Kikī, Benares, Suddhodana, Queen Māyā
dn14:1.16.1+dn14:3.33.3^where_else_menti: Himalayas, Great Brahmā, Sanctuary, India, Ukkaṭṭhā, the Subhaga Forest, Kapilavatthu
dn14:1.16.1+dn14:3.33.3^who_else_mention: the Buddha Vipassī, Koṇḍañña, Khaṇḍa, Tissa, Asoka, King Bandhuma, Queen Bandhumatī, Bandhumatī, Vipassī, Joyful Gods, Māras, Brahmās, Kāsī, Prince Vipassī, Bandhuma, Buddha, Brahmā’s, Brahmā, Alas, Buddha Vipassī, the Blessed One, the Holy One, Victor, Flung, The Buddha Vipassī, Buddhas, Saṅgha, Wander, Aviha, Kakusandha, Koṇāgamana, Kassapa, Gotama, Sāriputta, Moggallāna, King Suddhodana, Queen Māyā, Atappa
